pr_title: SAK-43316 Samigo Manage Rubrics error for instructors without permission

timeline.bodyText:
log.debug should print the exception message i.e.
log.debug("Current user doesn't have permission to get a rubric, {}" hcee.getMEssage());
timeline.author: ern

replies.bodyText: I'll add it, but I believe it was just 'null'
replies.author: bgarciaentornos
